title: Dangerous Stranger
description: A stranger enters the saloon demanding a free drink while making sure to display the polished sixshooter at his hip.

title: Music Group
description: A group of musicians enters the saloon and offers to entertain the guests if you pay them.

title: Gold Miner's Luck
description: A gold miner, fresh from the mountains, stumbles in with a big grin and a bag full of gold dust. He offers to buy a round for the entire saloon.

title: Traveling Salesman
description: A slick salesman offers to sell you a crate of 'miracle tonic' that he claims will bring in customers.

title: Piano Player's Pay Raise
description: Your loyal piano player asks for a raise, saying his tunes bring life to the saloon.

title: Wanted Poster
description: The sheriff wants to pin a wanted poster at the entrance, warning that a notorious outlaw may be in town.

title: Ladies' Night
description: Your bartender suggests a 'ladies' night' to bring in more business, but some regulars might take issue.

title: Brawl Breaks Out
description: Two drunken cowboys start a fight. Stopping it could prevent damage, but might be risky.

title: Broken Furniture
description: Despite your intervention, the fight left some tables and chairs broken. Will you charge the fighters for the damages?

title: Rowdy Crowd
description: Ladies’ Night is a big hit, but a group of rowdy cowboys starts causing trouble. Kick them out?

title: Outlaw Spotted
description: A patron suspects an outlaw matching the poster’s description. Do you quietly tip off the sheriff?

title: Piano Player's Encore
description: The piano player now attracts a dedicated crowd every night, and he asks if you’d like him to play later hours.

title: Miracle Tonic Disappointment
description: Customers realize the miracle tonic is just water with a dash of sugar. Some feel cheated and threaten to spread word.
